description: Text split into small units (tokens). Foundation of all LLM processing. Understand BPE subword and character tokenization.
learning_objectives: Understand token units,Compare tokenization methods,Analyze token efficiency

description: Tokens converted to vectors (numerical representations). Semantic meaning encoded in high-dimensional space.
learning_objectives: Convert tokens to vectors,Visualize embedding space,Measure semantic similarity

description: How each token/vector relates to every other. Self-attention mechanism computes contextual relationships.
learning_objectives: Understand attention mechanism,Visualize attention patterns,Compute attention scores

description: Stacked attention + feedforward blocks. Multiple layers apply attention and transformations repeatedly.
learning_objectives: Understand layer composition,Trace data through layers,Analyze layer outputs

description: Data and weights stored and computed in tensors (multi-dimensional arrays). Core data structure for deep learning.
learning_objectives: Manipulate tensor shapes,Understand broadcasting,Perform tensor operations

description: Complete overview of Large Language Model architecture from tokens to output.
learning_objectives: Understand LLM structure,Identify key components,Explain model flow

description: Design effective prompts to get desired outputs from LLMs. Zero-shot, few-shot, and chain-of-thought techniques.
learning_objectives: Design effective prompts,Apply prompt patterns,Optimize prompt structure

description: Control randomness and creativity in LLM outputs through temperature and sampling parameters.
learning_objectives: Understand temperature effects,Apply sampling strategies,Control output randomness

description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation combines retrieval with generation for accurate, contextual responses.
learning_objectives: Understand RAG architecture,Implement RAG pipeline,Evaluate RAG systems

description: Prepare and structure data for RAG systems. Data cleaning, chunking, and preprocessing.
learning_objectives: Prepare data for RAG,Implement chunking strategies,Optimize data structure

description: Store and retrieve embeddings efficiently using vector databases. FAISS, Pinecone, and similar tools.
learning_objectives: Use vector databases,Implement similarity search,Optimize retrieval
keywords: vector database, FAISS, Pinecone, similarity search

description: Production-ready RAG systems with hybrid search, reranking, and evaluation metrics.
learning_objectives: Implement hybrid search,Apply reranking,Evaluate RAG performance
keywords: hybrid search, reranking, evaluation, production RAG

description: Manage context windows effectively in RAG systems. Handle long documents and optimize context usage.
learning_objectives: Manage context windows,Optimize context usage,Handle long documents

description: Identify and prevent hallucinations in RAG outputs. Implement validation and verification.
learning_objectives: Detect hallucinations,Implement validation,Prevent false information

description: Adapt pre-trained LLMs to specific tasks through fine-tuning. Transfer learning for LLMs.
learning_objectives: Understand fine-tuning,Apply transfer learning,Evaluate fine-tuned models

description: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning using LoRA, QLoRA, and other efficient methods.
learning_objectives: Apply PEFT techniques,Use LoRA/QLoRA,Optimize fine-tuning

description: Prepare and structure datasets for fine-tuning. Data quality and format requirements.
learning_objectives: Prepare fine-tuning datasets,Ensure data quality,Format data correctly

description: Optimize LLM inference for speed and cost. Quantization and optimization techniques.
learning_objectives: Optimize inference speed,Apply quantization,Reduce inference costs

description: Reduce model size and speed up inference through quantization techniques.
learning_objectives: Understand quantization,Apply quantization techniques,Evaluate trade-offs

description: Strategies to reduce LLM deployment and inference costs.
learning_objectives: Analyze costs,Implement cost optimization,Monitor spending

description: Implement safety measures and guardrails for LLM applications. Content moderation and validation.
learning_objectives: Implement safety measures,Apply guardrails,Moderate content

description: Detect and filter inappropriate or harmful content in LLM outputs.
learning_objectives: Implement content moderation,Detect harmful content,Filter outputs

description: Validate and sanitize inputs to LLM systems to prevent attacks and errors.
learning_objectives: Validate inputs,Sanitize data,Prevent attacks

description: Build autonomous AI agents that can perform tasks, make decisions, and interact with environments.
learning_objectives: Build AI agents,Implement agent workflows,Design agent systems

description: Design and implement workflows for AI agents. Task planning and execution.
learning_objectives: Design agent workflows,Plan tasks,Execute agent actions

description: Integrate text, images, and other modalities in AI systems. Vision-language models.
learning_objectives: Work with multimodal data,Integrate modalities,Use vision-language models

description: Combine RAG with agent capabilities for more intelligent retrieval and generation.
learning_objectives: Build agentic RAG systems,Combine agents with RAG,Optimize agentic workflows
keywords: agentic RAG, intelligent retrieval, agent workflows

description: Design and coordinate multiple AI agents working together on complex tasks.
learning_objectives: Design multi-agent systems,Coordinate agents,Handle agent communication

description: Use reinforcement learning to fine-tune LLMs. RLHF and related techniques.
learning_objectives: Understand RLHF,Apply reinforcement learning,Fine-tune with RL
